tool.name: Extract populations
tool.description: of interest from FLOCK or Cross Sample output

exit_code.description: Please provide a comma separated list of populations to extract.
The populations to extract must be integers (i.e,: 1,2,4.)

param.name: method
param.label: What would you like to do?

tool.help:
This tool extracts events from given populations from FLOCK or Cross Sample outputs.
-----
**Input**
FLOCK or Cross Sample output - a table of the fluorescence intensities for each event and the population associated with each.
**Output**
The input file filtered for selected populations.
-----
**Example 1**
*Input* - fluorescence intensities per marker and population ID per event::
Marker1 Marker2 Marker3 ... Population 34 45 12 ... 1 33 65 10 ... 5 19 62 98 ... 2 12 36 58 ... 1 ... ... ... ... ...
*Populations selected:* 2
*Method:* Keep only the selected populations
*Output* - fluorescence intensities per marker and population ID per event::
Marker1 Marker2 Marker3 ... Population 19 62 98 ... 2 ... ... ... ... ...
**Example 2**
*Input* - fluorescence intensities per marker and population ID per event::
Marker1 Marker2 Marker3 ... Population 34 45 12 ... 1 33 65 10 ... 5 19 62 98 ... 2 12 36 58 ... 1 ... ... ... ... ...
*Populations selected:* 2
*Method:* Remove the selected populations
*Output* - fluorescence intensities per marker and population ID per event::
Marker1 Marker2 Marker3 ... Population 34 45 12 ... 1 33 65 10 ... 5 12 36 58 ... 1 ... ... ... ... ...
